title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.13 - Hitchhiking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.13 - Hitchhiking

State Regulations

Soliciting rides within the parkway system, commonly known
as "hitchhiking", is prohibited. Waiting within the parkway system for the
purpose of "hitchhiking" or participating in a "car pool", or as part of a
demonstration or protest, or for any other purpose, is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
